entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person who has been through a terrible ordeal and needs sleep, peace, and quiet.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who moved between Harry and Mrs. Weasley, trying to protect Harry.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as the one who let out a kind of muffled scream when she saw Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being present with Hermione and Bill, and may stay with Harry if he wants.

relationships.description: Dumbledore moved between Mrs. Weasley and Harry to protect him.
Mrs. Weasley was very concerned about Harry's well-being.
Ron may stay with Harry if he wants, according to Dumbledore.
Dumbledore instructed Mrs. Weasley not to question Harry until he is ready.
